title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 13 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 13 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Alex Berenson joins Clay and Buck for most of hour two to talk about covid vaccines mandates, crazy mask rules and his new book, Unreported Truths About Covid-19 and Lockdowns. What parents should know about covid vaccines and their kids. "Masks are worthless. Masks are a symbol of fear." Pressure to vaccinate won't come from the government, but by proxy through businesses, schools and corporations pushing for it. Callers weigh in on Alex Berenson and living during these coronavirus times.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
